title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5017.1 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5017.1 - General

State Regulations

The rules and regulations may be amended by a majority vote
of the entire retirement board at any duly called meeting, provided notice of
the substance of the amendment is mailed to the members of the retirement board
at least seven days prior to the date of the meeting. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5017.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
